Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Minnesota in 2005...
Traded from Minnesota to Anaheim on 7/4/2005 (Going to ANA: SS T. Tulowitzki. Going to MIN: P S. Marshall, P J. Rauch, P J. Gonzalez)...
Injured on 5/5/2006 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/25/2006 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Injured on 8/10/2006 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 10/1/2006, off Juan Dominguez (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/2/2007, off Javier Vazquez (CHA)...
Injured on 6/17/2010 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2010...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Cleveland on 1/31/2012 (Going to CLE: SS T. Tulowitzki, RF J. Werth, P R. Veloz. Going to LAA: LF M. Hildebrant, P Z. White)...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/28/2013 to a 1-year deal worth $4,125,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Tampa Bay on 5/24/2013...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/5/2014 to a 3-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 2/9/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Chicago (A) on 6/9/2017 (Going to CHA: P G. Moscoso, P S. Sherlock, RF T. Tulowitzki. Going to TB: 3B E. Holland, P H. Ambriz)...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/4/2018 to a 4-year deal worth $2,910,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 9/18/2020...
Hit 3 homeruns against Minnesota, driving in 5 runs on 9/23/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/26/2020, hitting .381 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Cleveland on 4/27/2021...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/10/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/14/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $850,000 per year...
Injured on 5/19/2023 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
